alert.note: Alert for Coastal York; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 23 at 3:07AM EST until February 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...RETURN TO WINTER THIS FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Potential exists for greater than 6 inches of snowfall. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to low visibility and snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Potential exists for heavy snowbands and snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour during the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
